dotagent is a lean, extensible agent runtime.

Use CLI commands to onboard, run local agent sessions, run the Discord gateway,
manage cron jobs, install skills, and manage executable toolpacks.

Usage:
  dotagent [flags]
  dotagent [command]

Available Commands:
  agent       Run direct local chat with the agent (CLI mode)
  cron        Manage scheduled jobs
  gateway     Run the Discord gateway + health server
  help        Help about any command
  onboard     Initialize ~/.dotagent config and workspace templates
  skills      Install, remove, search, and inspect skills
  status      Show configuration, provider, and runtime readiness
  toolpacks   Manage executable tool packs
  version     Show build/version metadata

Flags:
  -h, --help      help for dotagent
  -v, --version   Show build/version metadata

Use "dotagent [command] --help" for more information about a command.
